conversation.content: Hi there! How are you today?
I am good, thank you. How are you?
I'm doing well, thank you! Have you ever heard about the Eiffel Tower?
That's okay! The Eiffel Tower is a famous building in Paris, France. It is very tall and made of iron. Many people visit it every year. Would you like to know more?

Great! The Eiffel Tower was built in 1889. It was designed by Gustave Eiffel. You can go to the top and see a beautiful view of Paris. It's a must-see if you visit France! Do you have any other questions about it?
You're welcome! Good job learning about the Eiffel Tower. Talk to you later!
